title: Slow Boy
description: A tough cop in charge of a special felony squad goes after the vicious son of a Mafia chief who is pulling a string of strong-arm robberies.

title: Dangerous Games
description: Charlie Czonka goes undercover as pimp CZ Smith to break up a prostitution ring.

roles.char: Man at Table with Snake McKay

title: Requiem for an Informer
description: Detectives Calabrese and Jameson use a junkie as an informant to find a violent gang of bank robbers.

title: The Ten Year Honeymoon
description: The ten-year honeymoon concerned a pair of ... policemen! But even the best things in life come to an end. Divorce threatens when Shaner, one of the two men starts developing a strange, unpredictable behavior.

title: The Violent Homecoming
description: Sgt. Gaitan, a former Latino gang member, works to tamp down tensions between two gangs after the younger brother of one member is gunned down on the street.

title: The Ho Chi Minh Trail
description: Police Academy Cadet Mark Randolph is recruited, days before his graduation, by the narcotics squad to go undercover and infiltrate a drug operation.

title: Collision Course
description: Veteran officer Vince LaSorda has a rookie officer in his patrol car, and he doesn't like it one bit - the rookie is a woman.

title: Death on Credit
description: Det. Rick Cavelli goes undercover to investigate a theft ring that specializes in department stores and is involved in at least two murders.

title: The Big Walk
description: Veteran beat cop Jack Bonner shows rookie Freddie Archer the ropes while walking the beat, and is accused in court of sexual molestation by a young woman on trial for driving while intoxicated.

title: Man on a Rack
description: Koster, a detective with "the reputation as a man who cuts corners," arrives at the scene of a store robbery, sees an armed man running away, confronts him, and shoots him. But the man was an off-duty cop who was chasing the crook.

title: Chain of Command
description: Capt. Steve Calvino has to fight his superiors to get extra manpower to hunt down a cop-killer who may have racial motivations.

title: Countdown: Part 1
description: Sgt. Joe LaFrieda becomes the target of a Chicago mob family after he fatally shoots a younger son who was burglarizing a bottling plant.

title: The Ripper
description: Detectives Hallett and Baker hunt a serial killer who is attacking and mutilating gay men.

title: Country Boy
description: Cadets Crawford, Ryan, and Keegan struggle to get through the Police Academy.

title: Wyatt Earp Syndrome
description: Officer Nations is feeling the strain, in both his job and his personal life, of trying to solve all the world's ills from his patrol car.

title: Fingerprint
description: Charlie Ryan feels he is in a rut as a Forensics and Fingerprint detective.

title: The Gamble
description: Police Woman Lisa Beaumont joins Sgt. Crowley's vice squad. Their target is an illegal gambling operation. The operation is run by Carl Vitale and Lisa goes undercover to get inside the ring to win Vitale's trust. The police soon learn they could bust something much bigger than just Vitale when they discover he runs several private casinos all over town.

title: Requiem for C.Z. Smith
description: Charlie Czonka resurrects his alter ego, pimp CZ Smith, to catch a murderer who mutilates prostitutes.

title: Robbery: 48 Hours
description: Lt. Bruckner leads the Robbery Squad through a two-day run of holdups, big and small.

title: Glamour Boy
description: Detectives Tony Calabrese and Bert Jameson try to hold onto a charming bank robber, which proves to be more difficult than actually catching him.

title: Across the Line
description: Joe Benton is taken off the surveillance squad after being involved in too many stakeouts that ended violently, so Sgt. Barrett drafts him for his narcotics squad investigating the "Mexican Connection."

title: Wolf
description: Sgt. Wolf Bozeman, a gung ho street cop who lives through his job, tries to cope with the prospect of losing that job due to his deteriorating health.

title: Love, Mabel
description: Detectives investigate a series of murders of homeless men along the piers.

title: Explosion
description: Detectives Bert Jameson and Tony Calabrese try to catch an extortionist who leaves remote-control bombs at his targets.

title: Captain Hook
description: A police officer fights the brass to keep his spot as a beat cop after he loses his right hand to a package bomb.

title: Headhunter
description: IA Det. Sgt. Stiles investigates an indecent exposure charge against a veteran officer, resulting in the officer's dismissal. Months later, the exposure complainant confesses to a years-old murder, and subsequently raises doubt on his original testimony.

title: Year of the Dragon: Part 1
description: Det. John Darrin uses his experience in Chinatown to find the gang members who robbed a restaurant and killed one of the employees.

title: Year of the Dragon: Part 2
description: Det. John Darrin has to keep his primary witness to the restaurant shooting alive, while searching for his Chinese gang snitch, who has been snatched by a rival gang.

title: To Steal a Million
description: Detectives Grosser and Hyland know a big hotel heist is about to happen. They know who's involved, but they don't know which hotel or how to catch the thieves red-handed.

title: Sniper
description: Detectives Calabrese and Thorpe try to catch a sniper before he, or she, strikes again.

title: The Execution
description: Detectives attempt to solve a double execution-style shooting, which one victim manages to survive.

title: The Man in the Shadows
description: While breaking in new partner Ron Cruz, narcotics Det. Frank Dolan is drawn by a drug-related murder into pursuing an drug kingpin from out-of-town, who may be attempting to muscle his way into the local market.

title: War Games
description: Detectives Gordy and Ballard go undercover in a white-supremacist gun club to bust a paranoid gun collector who specializes in illegal military munitions.

title: The Witness
description: Det. Bert Jameson has a new partner, Lew Reeves, and Lew's vicious cold complicates their efforts to solve armed pharmacy robberies and to catch the chopper rider who holds up taverns.

title: Officer Needs Help
description: Sgt. Billy Humm starts feeling the pressure after he's involved in a few too many on-duty shootings, even though they were judged "good."

title: The Cutting Edge
description: Ed Peebles has 30 years on the force, and after his longtime partner retires he loses his direction, both on the job and in his personal life.

title: Losing Game
description: Margaret Case moves from Juvenile to Narcotics, but her undercover work puts stress on her marriage to another cop.

title: Face for a Shadow
description: Officers John Kowalski and Dick Elmore investigate a fatal hit-and-run accident that appears to be intentional.

title: Test of Brotherhood
description: Veteran officer JR Peters is paired in a patrol car with his younger brother Clay, a rookie, along with their sibling rivalry.

title: The Empty Weapon
description: On his first day out of the academy, Officer David Singer fails to fire his weapon when a juvenile delinquent he is pursuing pulls a gun on him, with tragic consequences later.

title: Little Boy Lost
description: Detective Ed Brenner searches for a missing 4-year-old boy.

title: Vice: 24 Hours
description: Pairs of vice detectives spend a day trying to bust a violent pimp, a bookie, and a man who wants to hire a hit man to kill his wife.

title: Breaking Point
description: Vince Della Maggiori has to investigate when a patrolman shoots a man in his hotel room, and the stories he is given don't add up.

title: Company Man
description: Married Det. Dave Hansen, under pressure from Internal Affairs, must decide whether to continue working for "the company" (LAPD), or stop seeing his school-teacher girlfriend.

title: Spanish Class
description: Young officer Taylor transfers from the Valley into the Hispanic district for "the action" and the pay bump, and is schooled in the art of patrolling a multilingual beat by veteran officer Fernandez.

title: Odyssey of Death: Part 1
description: Detectives Stoddard and Bagney look for a man involved in an armed grocery store robbery after he shoots and maims Officer Phillips, a personal friend of Stoddard.

title: Odyssey of Death: Part 2
description: Detectives close in on the multi-generational hill-country family responsible for a series of armed robberies, rapes, and murders.

title: The Other Side of the Fence
description: Detectives Benson and Fisk set up a sting to catch a pair of murderous jewel thieves.

title: 50 Cents-First Half Hour, $1.75 All Day
description: While trying to box in an armed bandit who specializes in stealing cars and robbing attendants at parking lots, Detectives Hacker and Barnes are assigned a homicide case.

title: Firebird
description: A daredevil officer is severely burned in a helicopter crash during a SWAT team training exercise, and he fights his injuries and police brass to return to his old life.

title: The Long Ball
description: Everyone around Sgt. Pickett knows he drinks too much. But he doesn't admit it to himself, until the department suspends him and his wife leaves.

title: Eamon Kinsella Royce
description: Detective Eamon Kinsella Royce juggles his police responsibilities and his second job . . . as an insurance investigator.

title: Officer Dooly
description: Despite his best intentions, Dooly is a poor guy who can't seem to do anything right, at least not in his commanding officer's eyes.

title: Open City
description: Vice Detectives Daley and Gentry are on a camping trip when they hear a woman scream in the distance, and a few minutes later, gunshots. Thus begins their investigation into Mob involvement in the pornography industry, and snuff films.

title: Payment Deferred
description: Detective Joe Barley enlists Holly, his "retired" snitch and recovering addict, to help him find the man who shot his partner.

title: Bought and Paid For
description: Detectives Belmont and Melino want the three men involved when a patrolman, the son of a Lieutenant, is killed when he interrupts a bank robbery. The one they need is the psychopath who recruits amateurs in his capers.

title: Two Frogs on a Mongoose
description: Manny and Deke are on the narcotics squad, investigating a double shooting at a dry cleaning shop, when they get a tip that the shop owner is in business dealing drugs with a man called Mongoose.

title: The Other Side of the Badge
description: Jack Mitchell is in control and keeps his cool when patrolling with his rookie partner, but his home life with his wife and her teenage daughter is not so tidy.

title: Three Days to Thirty
description: While working out his last three days before retirement, Frank Moran is assigned a hot case.

title: Trash Detail, Front and Center
description: Lew Randle, head of the Special Investigations Team, comes back after vacation and is immediately engulfed in the investigations of several armed robberies. He has to buck department politics to take down the violent trio responsible.

title: Thanksgiving
description: K-Joe and Bunny investigate the sniper shooting of a young girl riding in a car on the freeway.

title: Oxford Gray
description: Sgt. Kyles and Inv. McLiam try to break up the criminal activities of a local entrepreneur and philanthropist by bringing back his past as a violent revolutionary in Detroit and playing on his paranoia.

title: The Jar: Part 1
description: Two detectives are called before the grand jury after a man is shot and killed when they attempt to arrest him.

title: The Jar: Part 2
description: Hagen and Triplett are reassigned to an out-of-the-way detail to keep them out of the public eye pending their manslaughter trial.

title: Trial Board
description: An undercover Vice detective is accused by one of his fellow Vice detectives of stealing cash during a drug bust.

title: Spitfire
description: Detectives try to track down the two remaining robbers who participated in a tire store holdup that resulted in the deaths of an employee and one of the robbers. Their investigation leads them to a large illegal weapons operation.

title: Nightmare on a Sunday Morning
description: A young woman is snatched off a city street, driven out into the hills, and raped on a Sunday morning. Investigators Wells and Logan try to build a case against the two rapists by convincing the victim and a previous victim to testify.

title: The Malflores
description: Officers Webber and Cheruco discover a violent new gang on the streets, the Malflores, comprised entirely of Latinas.

title: The Blue Fog
description: Veteran Detective Jack McGraw is given the unsavory task of investigating Vice detectives suspected of taking bribes from the Chinese crime family running a prostitution operation.

title: Hard Rock Brown
description: LAPD Narcotics detectives work with a Mexican counterpart to try to break up the operation run by the Alvarez brothers, which is flooding the market with Mexican heroin known as "hard rock brown."

title: End of the Line
description: Detectives Gerard and Panelli try to catch a pair of armed robbers who hit a supermarket, and are joined by a one-armed former detective, who is now an investigator for the store's insurance company.

title: One of Our Cops Is Crazy
description: Sgt. Paul Cazenovia uses highly unconventional, albeit successful, methods in his undercover narcotics unit, but his lieutenant thinks he is crazy. It doesn't help that Paul refuses to stay behind his desk while he's under suspension.

title: Ice Time
description: Vice Detective Dave Tackleberry takes on a second job (to pay for his teenage daughter's figure skating development) at the same time he and his partner Det. Wurster try to bust a pimp specializing in underage girls.

title: Prime Rib
description: Marty Lacayo and Glenn Talbot are street narcs, meaning they are given the task of busting nickel-and-dime users and hustlers. Shep, one of their users, gives them a tasty lead on a big distributor, but they are forbidden by Lt. Hagedorn from pursuing him.

title: Stigma
description: Manny Mandell, involved in a shootout with a fleeing felon in which his partner is fatally wounded, receives a Police Department medal as a result. The survivor's guilt is bad enough, but as a medal winner he finds the expectations overwhelming.

title: Day of Terror... Night of Fear
description: Officer Ron Tice engages hostage-taker Richey Neptune in protracted negotiations, a task complicated by the fact that one of the five hostages is the Deputy Chief's daughter-in-law.

title: The Broken Badge
description: IA Sergeants Bivins and Petrelli investigate the fatal shooting of a prostitute by a veteran beat cop with a history of bending the rules. The cop is then convicted and sent to the same prison that holds some of the men he sent there.

title: No Margin for Error
description: Three people are fatally shot by three different policemen, two beat cops and a detective. Deputy Chief Hayes must sort through the shooting team reports to find the truth of each situation, possibly at the risk of his own career.

title: A Chance to Live
description: Officer Dan Shay is recruited to operate undercover for the narcotics unit at a high school.
